Articles.Content:
Hey guys. I saw the last of damion's KSP streams a few nights ago,so I am doing a livestream of KSP just for him.

Time: 12:45 PST (Not your area? Use this time conversion thingy (Im the U.S/Pacific):http://www.timezoneconverter.com/cgi-bin/tzc.tzc)

So thanks a lot if you are going to watch!

www.twitch.tv/bigboy734/new

Have fun and...

Fly Safe!
